page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA.
page.content: My name is Emma and I am ten years old.I go to school in Luckington and live at Norton,near Malmesbury. My typical school day is to get up at 7.oo a.m.After I have washed and dressed I make breakfast for my mother and my sister, her name is Amelia she is 6 years old. Breakfast is tea, cereals and toast. My mother takes my sister and I by car to school,there is no direct bus route. I then play with my friends in the playground until school starts at 9.00a.m.We work from 9.00 a.m. until 12.15a.m. Today is Tuesday and we do Handwriting and Maths inthe morning and Project work until school finishes at 3.15p.m. After school I am taken home by mother.Our tea is at 6.00p.m.I like to read books before my bed-time at 9.00p.m.
